summary: The EuroLeague is the top men's basketball league in Europe, featuring 18 teams with long-term licenses. It was first organized by FIBA in 1958 and later by ULEB and Euroleague Basketball. The competition has been known as the FIBA European Champions Cup and FIBA EuroLeague, with Real Madrid being the most successful club with 11 titles. The EuroLeague is very popular, attracting an average of over 10,000 fans per game, making it one of the world's most-attended indoor sports leagues outside the US.
title: EuroLeague
